# Event Website Project - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
This is a professional event website project optimized for hosting on Hostinger. The project includes sections for speakers, schedule, registration, and event information.

## Project Structure
- `index.html` - Main HTML file
- `css/` - Stylesheets directory
- `js/` - JavaScript files directory 
- `images/` - Image assets directory
- `assets/` - Additional assets directory
- `README.md` - Project documentation

## Development Guidelines
- Use semantic HTML5 structure
- Implement responsive design with mobile-first approach
- Optimize images for web performance
- Ensure cross-browser compatibility
- Follow accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1)
- Use modern CSS features (Flexbox, Grid)
- Implement clean, maintainable JavaScript

## Hosting Requirements (Hostinger)
- Static HTML/CSS/JS files
- Optimized file sizes for fast loading
- Proper file organization
- Compatible with shared hosting environment
- SEO-friendly structure

## File Naming Conventions
- Use lowercase letters and hyphens for file names
- Images: descriptive names with proper extensions
- CSS: BEM methodology for class naming
- JS: camelCase for variables and functions

## Performance Optimization
- Minify CSS and JavaScript for production
- Optimize images (WebP format when possible)
- Use efficient loading strategies
- Implement caching strategies
